Closet.speaker: none
Closet.text: I'm glad I had my suit ready.

Closet - Puzzle Solved.speaker: none
Closet - Puzzle Solved.text: Alright, let's see what we have here...

Duffle Bag.speaker: Detective
Duffle Bag.text: This should have all the things I need.

Stay A While.speaker: Detective
Stay A While.text: I'll check a few things before going out.
